name: css loaders & spinners
description: This is a library with a collection of different types of CSS loaders, spinners.

name: react-preloaders2
description: This project is a fork of vamosgs.github.io/react-preloaders fixing a bug related to React duplication in the latest versions of React.

name: react-loader-spinner
description: Stylish Spinners for Your ReactJS Applications.

name: react-loading-screen
description: A React loading screen. Can be used as a screensaver for the initial download of the application or as an overload screen for promises.
